wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Michael "Jonny" Rowell (born 10 September 1989) is an English footballer who plays as a midfielder Belgian side Dender.Rowell has predominantly spent his career in Belgium and played in the Belgian Pro League for Waasland-Beveren, as well as lower league sides Olympic Charleroi and Berchem Sport. Rowell also played in English Football League for Hartlepool United and in the Netherlands for Eerste Divisie side FC Eindhoven.

response: * Jonny Rowell, professional footballer who has played in the Belgian Pro League
* Jonny Rowell, Jonathan 'Jonny' Rowell (born 1989), English footballer

During a scouting trip to Norway, Fredriksen was spotted by Hartlepool United manager Chris Turner, signing him in July 2009. He made his debut for Hartlepool in a League One match on 8 August, away to Milton Keynes Dons in the 0–0 draw, before being substituted for Jonny Rowell in the 89th minute. He went on to make 12 league appearances in his first league season with the club. He left the club after having his contract cancelled by mutual consent on 20 October 2010.
